abstract: Carl Icahn has never shied away from a proxy fight, but the activist investor has turned especially feisty in his battle with the drug maker Amylin Pharmaceuticals.
lead_paragraph: Carl Icahn has never shied away from a proxy fight, but the activist investor has turned especially feisty in his battle with the drug maker Amylin Pharmaceuticals.

headline.main: Icahn Wields His Poison Pen Again
